SELECT diary.diary_id AS diaryId, diary.user_id as userId, diary.title AS title, diary.content AS content, diary.range AS `range`, create_date AS createDate, original_image AS originalImage, save_image AS saveImage, view_count AS viewCount, like_count AS likeCount, avty.avty_name AS avty FROM diary INNER JOIN user ON diary.user_id = user.user_id INNER JOIN avty ON user.avty_code = avty.avty_code
WHERE ${key} LIKE CONCAT('%' #{word} '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${orderByDir}
ORDER BY diary.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary (user_id, original_image, save_image, title, content, view_count, like_count) VALUE (#{userId}, #{originalImage}, #{saveImage}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount})
INSERT INTO comment (diary_id, user_id, parent_comment, content) VALUE (#{diaryId}, #{userId}, #{parentComment}, #{content})
